author: marioevz
content:
First EEST Release for Fusaka Devnet-0: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/fusaka-devnet-0%40v1.0.0

It does _not_ contain any PeerDAS tests, we are still working on those and they are close to being finished, and will be added to hive in the following days.

Please let us know if you encounter any issues! ğŸ™
